resources.string:
A profile is a file that stores all your information, like viewings, lists, etc. 
You can have multiple profiles. 
 
Each profile can be stored either in the internal storage of the app or externally, for instance in a local file or in the cloud. 
This can be changed in each profile's settings.
Unlinking a profile removes it from the app, but won\'t delete the associated file.
Deleting the profile will permanently destroy all data associated with it.

You\'re about to move the profile \"%1$s\" to a file stored outside the app\'s internal storage.\n\nChanges to your data will be reflected to this external file, and vice versa, making it the source of truth.
You\'re about to move the profile \"%1$s\" into the internal app storage.\n\nThe existing file will not be deleted, but it will no longer be accessed by the app.
The profile has been successfully moved
There has been an error moving the profile: %1$s
